item.title: Episode 004 - Camp & Don't Be Afraid To Rent
item.description: Show Notes After a long hiatus, WE ARE BACK! Camp season was busy and we talk about all of the adventures that we embarked on this summer. Join us as we talk about gear and approaches to production. We also talk about that sometimes renting is not a bad idea. Don’t be afraid to rent. item.title: Episode 002 - All Things Livestream Part 1
item.description: Show Notes Our second show was all about live streaming. This episode was jampacked with a lot of information so if you didn’t catch it all the first time around we added a lot of links below. There was so much to cover that we only went over the basics. Our next episode will be the second part of live streaming where we cover advanced topics such as adding graphics and lyrics to your stream, advanced camera adjustments, lighting, and much more.

item.title: Episode 001 - The Introduction
item.description: Show Notes This is our very first episode of the Church Media Lab podcast. Meet the two host of our show, Bradley and Anthony. We have quite a few interesting shows planned so stay tuned. As of publishing this we are currently on Pocketcast, AnchorFM, and Spotify. Within the upcoming weeks our podcast should be available in more apps. If you have any media related questions or would like to submit a show topic, please drop us an email or leave a comment on our social media.

item.title: About
item.description: Church Media Lab Host Anthony Roberts Anthony currently server as Assistant Pastor at Abundant Life Church where he also oversees all things media and creative. Anthony also works as a freelance graphic designer. In addition to media and creative and you can usually catch him slapping the bass on Sunday mornings. With 15 plus years in the church media and creative world he hopes to bring insight, experience and encouragement to those working in church media.
